milestoneMessages: Krampus has noticed that {user} has said **{word}** {count} times... The chains rattle closer.
Ho ho ho... {user} cannot stop saying **{word}**! {count} times now. Krampus is watching.
{user} has uttered **{word}** {count} times! Krampus sharpens his birch switches...
FOOLISH MORTAL! {user} has said **{word}** {count} times! Krampus adds another name to his list!
The darkness grows... {user} has spoken **{word}** {count} times. Krampus stirs from his slumber!
